'''Fir Wood'''  is obtained by cutting down Fir Trees. It is an item used to craft [[furnishings]].

==How to Obtain==
Fir Wood are found in [[Galesong Hill]] and [[Starfell Valley]].

See the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=174 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.
